20101222140130.000|20101222140131.000|CC1|CELEBRATED ASPECT OF IT.        
20101222140131.000|20101222140132.000|CC1|>> Reporter: IT REALLY IS,      
20101222140132.000|20101222140134.000|CC1|CHRIS, AND IT BEGAN YESTERDAY IN
20101222140134.000|20101222140135.000|CC1|THE CAPITOL WHEN NANCY PELOSI   
20101222140135.000|20101222140137.000|CC1|SIGNED WHAT'S CALLED AN         
20101222140137.000|20101222140138.000|CC1|ENROLLMENT DOCUMENT.            
20101222140138.000|20101222140139.000|CC1|YOU KNOW, EVERY TIME CONGRESS   
20101222140139.000|20101222140140.000|CC1|PASSES A BILL, THEY HAVE TO DO  
20101222140140.000|20101222140141.000|CC1|THIS AND SEND IT UP TO THE      
20101222140141.000|20101222140142.000|CC1|PRESIDENT.                      
20101222140142.000|20101222140144.000|CC1|NORMALLY THEY DON'T MAKE A BIG  
20101222140144.000|20101222140144.000|CC1|DEAL ABOUT IT.

20101222140147.000|20101222140149.000|CC1|CAPITOL VISITOR'S CENTER WHERE  
20101222140149.000|20101222140150.000|CC1|SHE SIGNED IT.

20101222140151.000|20101222140153.000|CC1|ADVOCATES THERE, ANY NUMBER OF  
20101222140153.000|20101222140154.000|CC1|MEMBERS OF CONGRESS WHO WANTED  
20101222140154.000|20101222140156.000|CC1|TO SPEAK AND ANY NUMBER OF THE  
20101222140156.000|20101222140158.000|CC1|MEMBERS OF MILITARY WHO HAD BEEN
20101222140158.000|20101222140159.000|CC1|THROWN OUT, AMONG THE 13,000    
20101222140159.000|20101222140201.000|CC1|MEMBERS OF THE MILITARY, CHRIS,

20101222140203.000|20101222140205.000|CC1|MILITARY OVER THE PAST 17 YEARS 
20101222140205.000|20101222140207.000|CC1|BECAUSE THEY WERE OPENLY SERVING

20101222140441.000|20101222140442.000|CC1|>> -- OWNERSHIP AND FATHERHOOD

20101222140446.000|20101222140449.000|CC1|BOTH OF -- IT'S A HISTORICAL

20101222140503.000|20101222140505.000|CC1|THERE'S STENY HOYER AND HARRY

20101222140516.000|20101222140520.000|CC1|IN THE HOUSE, AND WASN'T IT JOE 
20101222140520.000|20101222140522.000|CC1|LIEBERMAN WHO SAID GIVE ME A

20101222140525.000|20101222140526.000|CC1|BUT THE TECHNICALITIES THAT     
20101222140526.000|20101222140528.000|CC1|BORES THE HECK OUT OF PEOPLE,   
20101222140528.000|20101222140529.000|CC1|WAS ESSENTIAL.                  
20101222140529.000|20101222140530.000|CC1|>> IT WAS A QUESTION OF TIME AND
20101222140530.000|20101222140532.000|CC1|SUSAN COLLINS AND JOE LIEBERMAN,

20101222140607.000|20101222140609.000|CC1|REPUBLICAN GIVEAWAY, AND THERE

20101222141552.000|20101222141559.000|CC1|YOU KNOW, 66 YEARS AGO, IN THE

20101222141601.000|20101222141604.000|CC1|WESTERN EUROPE, ALLIED FORCES   
20101222141604.000|20101222141606.000|CC1|WERE BEATING BACK A MASSIVE     
20101222141606.000|20101222141608.000|CC1|ASSAULT IN WHAT WOULD BECOME    
20101222141608.000|20101222141608.000|CC1|KNOWN AS THE BATTLE OF THE      
20101222141608.000|20101222141611.000|CC1|BULGE.                          
20101222141611.000|20101222141615.000|CC1|AND IN THE FINAL DAYS OF THE    
20101222141615.000|20101222141619.000|CC1|FIGHTING, A REGIMENT IN THE 80th
20101222141619.000|20101222141624.000|CC1|DIVISION OF PATTON'S THIRD ARMY,
20101222141624.000|20101222141625.000|CC1|CAME UNDER FIRE.                
20101222141625.000|20101222141628.000|CC1|THE MEN WERE TRAVELING ALONG A  
20101222141628.000|20101222141629.000|CC1|NARROW TRAIL.                   
20101222141629.000|20101222141632.000|CC1|THEY WERE EXPOSED.              
20101222141632.000|20101222141633.000|CC1|AND THEY WERE VULNERABLE.       
20101222141633.000|20101222141635.000|CC1|HUNDREDS OF SOLDIERS WERE CUT   
20101222141635.000|20101222141637.000|CC1|DOWN BY THE ENEMY.              
20101222141637.000|20101222141642.000|CC1|AND DURING THE FIREFIGHT, A     
20101222141642.000|20101222141646.000|CC1|PRIVATE NAMED LLOYD CORWIN      
20101222141646.000|20101222141647.000|CC1|TUMBLED 40 FEET DOWN THE DEEP   
20101222141647.000|20101222141650.000|CC1|SIDE OF A RAVINE.               
20101222141650.000|20101222141652.000|CC1|AND DAZED AND TRAPPED, HE WAS AS
20101222141652.000|20101222141654.000|CC1|GOOD AS DEAD.                   
20101222141654.000|20101222141658.000|CC1|BUT ONE SOLDIER, A FRIEND,      
20101222141658.000|20101222141703.000|CC1|TURNED BACK.                    
20101222141703.000|20101222141706.000|CC1|AND WITH SHELLS LANDING AROUND  
20101222141706.000|20101222141707.000|CC1|HIM, AMID SMOKE AND CHAOS AND   
20101222141707.000|20101222141709.000|CC1|THE SCREAMS OF WOUNDED MEN, THIS
20101222141709.000|20101222141713.000|CC1|SOLDIER, THIS FRIEND, SCALED    
20101222141713.000|20101222141717.000|CC1|DOWN THE ICY SLOPE, RISKING HIS 
20101222141717.000|20101222141721.000|CC1|OWN LIFE TO BRING PRIVATE CORWIN
20101222141721.000|20101222141723.000|CC1|TO SAFER GROUND.                
20101222141723.000|20101222141725.000|CC1|AND FOR THE REST OF HIS YEARS,  
20101222141725.000|20101222141727.000|CC1|LLOYD CREDITED THIS SOLDIER,    
20101222141727.000|20101222141731.000|CC1|THIS FRIEND, NAMED ANDY LEE,    
20101222141731.000|20101222141734.000|CC1|WITH SAVING HIS LIFE.           
20101222141734.000|20101222141736.000|CC1|KNOWING HE WOULD NEVER HAVE MADE
20101222141736.000|20101222141741.000|CC1|IT OUT ALONE.                   
20101222141741.000|20101222141742.000|CC1|IT WAS A FULL FOUR DECADES AFTER
20101222141742.000|20101222141747.000|CC1|THE WAR WHEN THE TWO FRIENDS    
20101222141747.000|20101222141751.000|CC1|REUNITED IN THEIR GOLDEN YEARS, 
20101222141751.000|20101222141752.000|CC1|THAT LLOYD LEARNED THAT THE MAN 
20101222141752.000|20101222141755.000|CC1|WHO SAVED HIS LIFE, HIS FRIEND  
20101222141755.000|20101222141757.000|CC1|ANDY, WAS GAY.                  
20101222141757.000|20101222141800.000|CC1|HE HAD NO IDEA.                 
20101222141800.000|20101222141806.000|CC1|AND HE DIDN'T MUCH CARE.        
20101222141806.000|20101222141808.000|CC1|LLOYD KNEW WHAT MATTERED.       
20101222141808.000|20101222141810.000|CC1|HE KNEW WHAT HAD KEPT HIM ALIVE,
20101222141810.000|20101222141811.000|CC1|WHAT MADE IT POSSIBLE FOR HIM TO
20101222141811.000|20101222141814.000|CC1|COME HOME AND START A FAMILY AND
20101222141814.000|20101222141818.000|CC1|LIVE THE REST OF HIS LIFE, IT   
20101222141818.000|20101222141822.000|CC1|WAS HIS FRIEND.                 
20101222141822.000|20101222141823.000|CC1|AND LLOYD'S SON IS WITH US      
20101222141823.000|20101222141825.000|CC1|TODAY.                          
20101222141825.000|20101222141828.000|CC1|AND HE KNEW THAT VALOR AND      
20101222141828.000|20101222141829.000|CC1|SACRIFICE ARE NO MORE LIMITED BY
20101222141829.000|20101222141832.000|CC1|SEXUAL ORIENTATION THAN THEY ARE
20101222141832.000|20101222141834.000|CC1|BY RACE OR BY GENDER OR BY      
20101222141834.000|20101222141838.000|CC1|RELIGION OR BY CREED THAN WHAT  
20101222141838.000|20101222141839.000|CC1|MADE IT POSSIBLE FOR HIM TO     
20101222141839.000|20101222141840.000|CC1|SURVIVE THE BATTLEFIELDS OF     
20101222141840.000|20101222141843.000|CC1|EUROPE IS THE REASON THAT WE ARE
20101222141843.000|20101222141846.000|CC1|HERE TODAY.                     
20101222141846.000|20101222141846.000|CC1|THAT'S THE REASON WE ARE HERE   
20101222141846.000|20101222141905.000|CC1|TODAY.                          
20101222141905.000|20101222141909.000|CC1|SO, THIS MORNING I AM PROUD TO  
20101222141909.000|20101222141910.000|CC1|SIGN A LAW THAT WILL BRING AN   
20101222141910.000|20101222141916.000|CC1|END TO DON'T ASK, DON'T TELL.   
20101222141916.000|20101222141923.000|CC1|IT IS A LAW -- THIS LAW I'M     
20101222141923.000|20101222141924.000|CC1|ABOUT TO SIGN WILL STRENGTHEN   
20101222141924.000|20101222141929.000|CC1|OUR NATIONAL SECURITY AND UPHOLD
20101222141929.000|20101222141931.000|CC1|THE IDEALS THAT OUR FIGHTING MEN
20101222141931.000|20101222141932.000|CC1|AND WOMEN RISK THEIR LIVES TO   
20101222141932.000|20101222141935.000|CC1|DEFEND.                         
20101222141935.000|20101222141937.000|CC1|NO LONGER WILL OUR COUNTRY BE   
20101222141937.000|20101222141938.000|CC1|DENIED THE SERVICE OF THOUSANDS 
20101222141938.000|20101222141941.000|CC1|OF PATRIOTIC AMERICANS WHO WERE 
20101222141941.000|20101222141943.000|CC1|FORCED TO LEAVE THE MILITARY,   
20101222141943.000|20101222141944.000|CC1|REGARDLESS OF THEIR SKILLS, NO  
20101222141944.000|20101222141946.000|CC1|MATTER THEIR BRAVERY OR THEIR

20101222141949.000|20101222141951.000|CC1|EXEMPLARY PERFORMANCE BECAUSE   
20101222141951.000|20101222141952.000|CC1|THEY HAPPENED TO BE GAY.

20101222141955.000|20101222141956.000|CC1|OF AMERICANS IN UNIFORM BE ASKED

20101222142000.000|20101222142001.000|CC1|SHOULDER IN ORDER TO SERVE THE  
20101222142001.000|20101222142013.000|CC1|COUNTRY THAT THEY LOVE.

20101222142017.000|20101222142018.000|CC1|OUR PEOPLE SACRIFICE A LOT FOR  
20101222142018.000|20101222142020.000|CC1|THEIR COUNTRY, INCLUDING THEIR

20101222142653.000|20101222142653.000|CC1|FIGHT.                          
20101222142653.000|20101222142657.000|CC1|BECAUSE OF THESE EFFORTS, IN THE
20101222142657.000|20101222142659.000|CC1|COMING DAYS WE WILL BEGIN THE   
20101222142659.000|20101222142702.000|CC1|PROCESS LAID OUT BY THIS LAW.   
20101222142702.000|20101222142704.000|CC1|NOW, THE OLD POLICY REMAINS IN  
20101222142704.000|20101222142707.000|CC1|EFFECT UNTIL SECRETARY GATES,   
20101222142707.000|20101222142708.000|CC1|ADMIRAL MULLEN, AND I CERTIFY   
20101222142708.000|20101222142710.000|CC1|THE MILITARY'S READINESS TO     
20101222142710.000|20101222142711.000|CC1|IMPLEMENT THE REPEAL.           
20101222142711.000|20101222142712.000|CC1|AND IT'S ESPECIALLY IMPORTANT   
20101222142712.000|20101222142714.000|CC1|FOR SERVICE MEMBERS TO REMEMBER 
20101222142714.000|20101222142715.000|CC1|THAT.                           
20101222142715.000|20101222142717.000|CC1|BUT I'VE SPOKEN TO EVERY ONE OF 
20101222142717.000|20101222142718.000|CC1|THE SERVICE CHIEFS, AND THEY ARE
20101222142718.000|20101222142720.000|CC1|ALL COMMITTED TO IMPLEMENTING   
20101222142720.000|20101222142723.000|CC1|THIS CHANGE SWIFTLY AND         
20101222142723.000|20101222142723.000|CC1|EFFICIENTLY.                    
20101222142723.000|20101222142724.000|CC1|WE ARE NOT GOING TO BE DRAGGING 
20101222142724.000|20101222142742.000|CC1|OUR FEET TO GET THIS DONE.      
20101222142742.000|20101222142745.000|CC1|NOW, WITH ANY CHANGE THERE'S    
20101222142745.000|20101222142747.000|CC1|SOME APPREHENSION.              
20101222142747.000|20101222142750.000|CC1|THAT'S NATURAL.                 
20101222142750.000|20101222142753.000|CC1|BUT AS COMMANDER IN CHIEF, I AM 
20101222142753.000|20101222142755.000|CC1|CERTAIN THAT WE CAN EFFECT THIS 
20101222142755.000|20101222142757.000|CC1|TRANSITION IN A WAY THAT ONLY   
20101222142757.000|20101222142800.000|CC1|STRENGTHENS OUR MILITARY        
20101222142800.000|20101222142800.000|CC1|READINESS.                      
20101222142800.000|20101222142801.000|CC1|AND PEOPLE WILL LOOK BACK ON    
20101222142801.000|20101222142803.000|CC1|THIS MOMENT AND WONDER, WHY WAS 
20101222142803.000|20101222142805.000|CC1|IT EVER A SOURCE OF CONTROVERSY 
20101222142805.000|20101222142808.000|CC1|IN THE FIRST PLACE.             
20101222142808.000|20101222142810.000|CC1|I HAVE EVERY CONFIDENCE IN THE  
20101222142810.000|20101222142811.000|CC1|PROFESSIONALISM AND PATRIOTISM

20101222142814.000|20101222142817.000|CC1|THEY HAVE ADAPTED AND GROWN

20101222142819.000|20101222142819.000|CC1|CHANGES, I KNOW THEY WILL DO SO 
20101222142819.000|20101222142821.000|CC1|AGAIN.                          
20101222142821.000|20101222142823.000|CC1|I KNOW THAT SECRETARY GATES,    
20101222142823.000|20101222142825.000|CC1|ADMIRAL MULLEN, AS WELL AS THE

20101222142828.000|20101222142831.000|CC1|AND THEY SHARE IT BASED ON THEIR
20101222142831.000|20101222142833.000|CC1|OWN EXPERIENCES, INCLUDING THE  
20101222142833.000|20101222142834.000|CC1|EXPERIENCE OF SERVING WITH      
20101222142834.000|20101222142836.000|CC1|DEDICATED, DUTY-BOUND SERVICE   
20101222142836.000|20101222142840.000|CC1|MEMBERS WHO ARE ALSO GAY.       
20101222142840.000|20101222142841.000|CC1|AS ONE SPECIAL OPERATIONS WAR   
20101222142841.000|20101222142843.000|CC1|FIGHTER SAID DURING THE         
20101222142843.000|20101222142844.000|CC1|PENTAGON'S REVIEW, THIS WAS ONE 
20101222142844.000|20101222142847.000|CC1|OF MY FAVORITES, IT ECHOES THE  
20101222142847.000|20101222142849.000|CC1|EXPERIENCE OF LLOYD CORWIN      
20101222142849.000|20101222142850.000|CC1|DECADES EARLIER, WE HAVE A GAY  
20101222142850.000|20101222142853.000|CC1|GUY IN THE UNIT.                
20101222142853.000|20101222142854.000|CC1|HE'S BIG.                       
20101222142854.000|20101222142855.000|CC1|HE'S MEAN.                      
20101222142855.000|20101222142858.000|CC1|HE KILLS LOTS OF BAD GUYS.      
20101222142858.000|20101222142902.000|CC1|NO ONE CARED THAT HE WAS GAY.   
20101222142902.000|20101222142903.000|CC1|AND I THINK THAT SUMS UP        
20101222142903.000|20101222142909.000|CC1|PERFECTLY THE SITUATION.        
20101222142909.000|20101222142919.000|CC1|SO, FINALLY I WANT TO SPEAK     
20101222142919.000|20101222142921.000|CC1|DIRECTLY TO THE GAY MEN AND     
20101222142921.000|20101222142922.000|CC1|WOMEN CURRENTLY SERVING IN OUR  
20101222142922.000|20101222142924.000|CC1|MILITARY.                       
20101222142924.000|20101222142928.000|CC1|FOR A LONG TIME YOUR SERVICE HAS
20101222142928.000|20101222142928.000|CC1|DEMANDED A PARTICULAR KIND OF   
20101222142928.000|20101222142931.000|CC1|SACRIFICE.                      
20101222142931.000|20101222142933.000|CC1|YOU'VE BEEN ASKED TO CARRY THE  
20101222142933.000|20101222142938.000|CC1|ADDED BURDEN OF SECRECY AND     
20101222142938.000|20101222142939.000|CC1|ISOLATION, AND ALL THE WHILE    
20101222142939.000|20101222142940.000|CC1|YOU'VE PUT YOUR LIVES ON THE    
20101222142940.000|20101222142942.000|CC1|LINE FOR THE FREEDOMS AND       
20101222142942.000|20101222142943.000|CC1|PRIVILEGES OF CITIZENSHIP THAT  
20101222142943.000|20101222142946.000|CC1|ARE NOT FULLY GRANTED TO YOU.   
20101222142946.000|20101222142946.000|CC1|YOU'RE NOT THE FIRST TO HAVE    
20101222142946.000|20101222142951.000|CC1|CARRIED THIS BURDEN.            
20101222142951.000|20101222142952.000|CC1|FOR WHILE TODAY MARKS THE END OF
20101222142952.000|20101222142954.000|CC1|A PARTICULAR STRUGGLE THAT HAS  
20101222142954.000|20101222142956.000|CC1|LASTED ALMOST TWO DECADES, THIS 
20101222142956.000|20101222142957.000|CC1|IS A MOMENT MORE THAN TWO       
20101222142957.000|20101222143001.000|CC1|CENTURIES IN THE MAKING.        
20101222143001.000|20101222143002.000|CC1|THERE WILL NEVER BE A FULL      
20101222143002.000|20101222143005.000|CC1|ACCOUNTING OF THE HEROISM       
20101222143005.000|20101222143006.000|CC1|DEMONSTRATED BY GAY AMERICANS IN
20101222143006.000|20101222143007.000|CC1|SERVICE TO THIS COUNTRY.        
20101222143007.000|20101222143008.000|CC1|THEIR SERVICE HAS BEEN OBSCURED 
20101222143008.000|20101222143010.000|CC1|IN HISTORY.                     
20101222143010.000|20101222143012.000|CC1|IT'S BEEN LOST TO PREJUDICES    
20101222143012.000|20101222143014.000|CC1|THAT HAVE WANED IN OUR OWN      
20101222143014.000|20101222143015.000|CC1|LIFETIMES.                      
20101222143015.000|20101222143017.000|CC1|BUT AT EVERY TURN, AT EVERY     
20101222143017.000|20101222143021.000|CC1|CROSSROADS IN OUR PAST, WE KNOW 
20101222143021.000|20101222143024.000|CC1|GAY AMERICANS FOUGHT JUST AS    
20101222143024.000|20101222143026.000|CC1|HARD, GAVE JUST AS MUCH TO      
20101222143026.000|20101222143027.000|CC1|PROTECT THIS NATION AND THE     
20101222143027.000|20101222143030.000|CC1|IDEALS FOR WHICH IT STANDS.     
20101222143030.000|20101222143032.000|CC1|THERE CAN BE LITTLE DOUBT THERE 
20101222143032.000|20101222143033.000|CC1|WERE GAY SOLDIERS WHO FOUGHT FOR
20101222143033.000|20101222143037.000|CC1|AMERICAN INDEPENDENCE, WHO      
20101222143037.000|20101222143039.000|CC1|CONSECRATED THE GROUND AT       
20101222143039.000|20101222143040.000|CC1|GETTYSBURG, WHO MANNED THE      
20101222143040.000|20101222143042.000|CC1|TRENCHES ALONG THE WESTERN      
20101222143042.000|20101222143044.000|CC1|FRONT, WHO STORMED THE BEACHES  
20101222143044.000|20101222143046.000|CC1|OF IWO JIMA.

20101222143048.000|20101222143051.000|CC1|WALLS OF OUR MEMORIALS.         
20101222143051.000|20101222143053.000|CC1|THEIR HEADSTONES DOT THE GROUNDS
20101222143053.000|20101222143057.000|CC1|AT ARLINGTON.                   
20101222143057.000|20101222143059.000|CC1|AND SO AS THE FIRST GENERATION  
20101222143059.000|20101222143103.000|CC1|TO SERVE OPENLY IN OUR ARMED    
20101222143103.000|20101222143104.000|CC1|FORCES, YOU WILL STAND FOR ALL  
20101222143104.000|20101222143107.000|CC1|THOSE WHO CAME BEFORE YOU, AND  
20101222143107.000|20101222143109.000|CC1|YOU WILL SERVE AS ROLE MODELS TO
20101222143109.000|20101222143112.000|CC1|ALL WHO COME AFTER.             
20101222143112.000|20101222143115.000|CC1|AND I KNOW THAT YOU WILL FULFILL
20101222143115.000|20101222143115.000|CC1|THIS RESPONSIBILITY WITH        
20101222143115.000|20101222143120.000|CC1|INTEGRITY AND HONOR, JUST AS YOU
20101222143120.000|20101222143121.000|CC1|HAVE EVERY OTHER MISSION WITH   
20101222143121.000|20101222143124.000|CC1|WHICH YOU'VE BEEN CHARGED.      
20101222143124.000|20101222143126.000|CC1|AND YOU NEED TO LOOK NO FURTHER 
20101222143126.000|20101222143127.000|CC1|THAN THE SERVICEMEN AND WOMEN IN
20101222143127.000|20101222143131.000|CC1|THIS ROOM, DISTINGUISHED        
20101222143131.000|20101222143133.000|CC1|OFFICERS LIKE FORMER NAVY       
20101222143133.000|20101222143150.000|CC1|COMMANDERS ZOE DUNNING.         
20101222143150.000|20101222143154.000|CC1|MARINES, MARINES LIKE ERIC ALBA,
20101222143154.000|20101222143154.000|CC1|ONE OF THE FIRST AMERICANS TO BE
20101222143154.000|20101222143208.000|CC1|INJURED IN IRAQ.

20101222143218.000|20101222143220.000|CC1|VALOR.                          
20101222143220.000|20101222143227.000|CC1|HE WAS -- WELL, HE WAS -- HE WAS

20101222143938.000|20101222143939.000|CC1|>> I'VE BEEN SERVING WITH GAYS

20101222143949.000|20101222143950.000|CC1|MORE, NEARLY EVERYONE IN THE    
20101222143950.000|20101222143951.000|CC1|CREW KNEW IT.
